p: As part of our work on the essential oils of Tetraclinis articulata [ 1], this plant is a very slow-growing coniferous species, longevity of which may exceed 400 years. In height, the annual increment is estimated to be 20â€‰cm/year up to 25 years and 10 cm/year up to 60 years. In diameter, it is 3 to 4 mm/year up to 30 years and 1.5 to 2.5 mm/year up to 60 years. These numbers depend on several parameters, including soil depth and annual precipitation [ 2].
